title: Apartment for rent (9/1/22)
map_address: Poplar St near Cornauba St Ext
posting_body: Easy access to Roslindale village center (½ mile, 5 min walk) with weekly farmer’s markets, shops, restaurants, library, commuter rail, and buses that connect to Forrest Hills station.
5 min drive to the Arnold Arboretum.
Wonderful first floor rental unit in this vibrant, warm, and friendly neighborhood where neighbors talk to each other.
This sunny apartment is open and bright with a large entryway leading into the living room, with hardwood floors, open concept to the dining and kitchen area.
Lots of southern exposure and windows for beautiful natural light.
The kitchen is open with a large island.
There is also a front porch for warm summer nights.
The small yard has lovely gardens throughout and a homey feel.
Looking for open-minded, respectful, and community-oriented tenants.
We endeavor to maintain a sense of community between the two units, seeking tenants who value the benefits of living in harmony.
Existing upstairs apartment tenants are quiet, respectful, and conscious individuals who value community, respect the environment, and stand for social justice.
We believe equality and equity are basic human rights.
We do our best for a just and peaceful world.
You’ll know this opportunity is right for you if you want a community-oriented living situation (and you’re not afraid of compost!).
Pets: Generally, no pets (however, will consider cats)
Laundry: Laundry (washer/dryer for first floor unit use in basement)
Storage: In unit as well as additional storage in basement
Other: Lawn/garden care/Landscaping, Snow Removal, Trash Removal
